response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, it's valued at $10,000 to us. Considering its worth to you is $8,000, I propose we strike a fair deal. Would you be interested in acquiring this product for $9,500? This price reflects the value we place on your satisfaction while ensuring a reasonable profit for us. Let me know if this offer aligns with your budget and preferences.", "product_price": 9500}
